summary: This mod gives you a new kind of Daedric armor... WHITE Daedric Armor! You can use it to hide in snow, or simply to look cool
descriptionHtml:
This mod gives you a new kind of Daedric armor... WHITE Daedric Armor! You can use it to hide in snow, or simply to look cool. It\'s just a makeover of the original black daedric armor. It was originally going to be Holy Daedric armor, but I changed it. Enjoy!
All this work goes to regaz93 who has a Youtube tutorial on how to make your own armor!
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=p02NysXwV5U
author: rainingXsalami
